text: Ndithudi Mulungu ndiye yekha amene amadziwa za kudza kwake kwa tsiku lachiweruzo. Ndiye amene amatsitsa mvula ndiponso amadziwa zimene zili mâ€™mimba mwa akazi. Ndipo palibe amene amadziwa zimene zingamuonekere mawa ndipo palibe amene amadziwa dziko limene adzafere. Ndithudi Mulungu ndi Wodziwa ndi Wozindikira
